TextBody:
Hi Prerana,

As I asked you on the other ticket, 442707, the feature request has to be opened on our community portal, on the following link:
https://community.netwrix.com/c/products/endpoint-protector/ideas/109

I will be closing this ticket, since feature requests need to be opened on the portal.

Best regards,
Botond Biro | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com
